title: Jian Wang 3: Xia Gan Yi Dan Shen Jianxin II

synonyms: Jian Wang 3: Xia Gan Yi Dan Shen Jianxin 2nd Season
JX3: Chivalrous Hero Shen Jianxin 2nd Season
剑网3·侠肝义胆沈剑心 第二季
alternative_titles.en: JX Online3: The Adventure of Shen Jianxin II
alternative_titles.ja: 剑网3·侠肝义胆沈剑心 II

synopsis:
Full of confidence after drawing the Heavenly Sword, Shen Jianxin descended the mountain and returned to the martial world. Meanwhile, the Central Plains martial arts world faced an unprecedented crisis. Bearing the power of his birth chart and the Heavenly Sword, Shen Jianxin was tasked with a perilous mission to enter the world of seafaring, becoming embroiled in layers of intrigue. During his journey, unexpected events occurred one after another, and the identities of mysterious figures were gradually revealed…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
